data.title: Tum Mile Lyric Video - Title Track | Emraan Hashmi | Soha Ali Khan | Pritam | Neeraj Shridhar
data.description:
Dive into the emotions of 'Tum Mile' with the mesmerizing lyric video of its title track, featuring Emraan Hashmi and Soha Ali Khan. 🎶 Let Neeraj Shridhar's soulful voice and Pritam's enchanting music take you on a journey of love amidst Mumbai's monsoon. 💖 Experience the magic of romance all over again.

🌟 Song Credits 🌟 
Song Name - Tum Mile
Movie - Tum Mile
Singer - Neeraj Shridhar
Music - Pritam
Lyrics - Kumaar
Director - Kunal Deshmukh
Studio - Vishesh Films
Producer - Mahesh Bhatt & Kumkum...
